__e: Well, that's because you're such a sweet, gentle.... Do you--? Do you--?
And you best believe I'm still coming to you for things like taxes and the best laundry detergent.
My questions are not for you... to win a packet of soap powder... or a plane ticket... but to put you away for life.
Perhaps, Reverend, fetch me some water and see if there is some scrubbing soap to be had.
And you best believe I'm still coming to you for things like taxes and the best laundry detergent.
My questions are not for you... to win a packet of soap powder... or a plane ticket... but to put you away for life.
It doesn't respond well to soap and water, all right?
Are you asking me to give up food and soap... and God knows what else, so I can starve and sing?
You'll be surprised what a little soap will do for this place.
